price: Kuma rãnar da yake tãra su gaba ɗaya (Yanã cẽwa): "Yã jama'ar aljannu! Lalle ne kun yawaita kanku daga mutãne." Kuma majiɓantansu daga mutãne suka ce: "Yã Ubangjinmu! Sãshenmu* ya ji dãɗi da sãshe, kuma mun kai ga ajalinmu wanda Ka yanka mana!" (Allah) Ya ce: "Wuta ce mazaunarku, kunã madawwama acikinta, sai abin da Allah Ya so. Lalle ne Ubangijinka Mai hikima ne, Masani."
arabic: وَيَوۡمَ يَحۡشُرُهُمۡ جَمِيعٗا يَٰمَعۡشَرَ ٱلۡجِنِّ قَدِ ٱسۡتَكۡثَرۡتُم مِّنَ ٱلۡإِنسِۖ وَقَالَ أَوۡلِيَآؤُهُم مِّنَ ٱلۡإِنسِ رَبَّنَا ٱسۡتَمۡتَعَ بَعۡضُنَا بِبَعۡضٖ وَبَلَغۡنَآ أَجَلَنَا ٱلَّذِيٓ أَجَّلۡتَ لَنَاۚ قَالَ ٱلنَّارُ مَثۡوَىٰكُمۡ خَٰلِدِينَ فِيهَآ إِلَّا مَا شَآءَ ٱللَّهُۚ إِنَّ رَبَّكَ حَكِيمٌ عَلِيمٞ
footnotes: * Haka dai mai laifi a bãyan azãbar laifinsa ta tabbata a kansa bã ya ɓõyewar abin da ya riga ya bayyanã, sai ya faɗa da kansa dõmin ya bayyanar da nadãmarsa a lõkacin da nadãma bã ta da amfãni

version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.
